name: Quill
description:
A 2D Collect-athon and MetroidVania Hybrid!

  • Explore the World! - 7 different interconnected levels to explore of unique themes ideas.
  •  Collect abilities! - Gain 3 different abilities, adding variation in how you play.
  • Unlock characters! - Unlock 3 different characters for those who wish to complete the game

Follow my Instagram to see what I'm up to!- https://www.instagram.com/platymekk/

This game was made for a school project and is therefore a bit short but I might expand on it as I see a lot more potential in this game than my time has allowed. Don't expect anything though... I hope you enjoy!
